scripts.build: npm run build:front && npm run build:back
scripts.dev:back: cross-env PORT=5555 USE_DB=false tsx watch server/src/main.ts
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n front,back -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:front" "npm run dev:back"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently -k -n front,back -c cyan,magenta "npm run start:front" "npm run start:back"
